notificationDataUriError.message: It can't be searched because it's an unsupported image format(Data URI).

notificationDownloadLanguageError.message: Failed to download list of language.

htmlLinkageMessage.message: When clicked Upper Right Button, Wiktionary linkage is enabled. Regardless whether you intent or not, if you select text, it will be automatically sent to Wiktionary to search, even if it's your privacy information like a password. Please understand it and use carefully. We recommend that you disable it when you don't need it.

htmlMeaningNotFound.message: The page was found but "Cut out description" was failed.

htmlSectionNotFound.message: The page was found but there ware no description for the language specified in "Language filter".

htmlPageNotFound.message: The page could not be found.

htmlConnectionError.message: Could not connect to the server. $ERROR$

htmlFormDescription.message: You can add, change in order, edit, delete fields. If added blank fields, You have to input "Site name" and "URL" by yourself. In the URL field "$$1" will be replaced to the text selected.

htmlPresetDescription.message: Select some sites and press "Add" button. Then it's added to Widget.

htmlLabelDescription.message: Site name is displayed instead of URL.

htmlUrlDescription.message: A URL to link. "$$1" will be replaced to the text selected.

alertHistoryAllDelete.message: All history will be deleted. It contains the records that isn't displayed on the table.

htmlHistoryDescription.message: History data is used by "Find weak point" function. History data is saved into your PC. It is not covered by browser synchronization service. You can change configuration to save or not in "Link edit" menu.

htmlRankingDescription.message: Search count is aggregated from history. Please select date range and click "Aggregate" button. If you delete some of history, Search count decreases too. Let's find your weakness and study efficiently.

htmlApiServiceDescription.message: Wiktionary is a dictionary site made by volunteers. The description of word you selected is displayed using Wiktionary.

htmlServiceCodeDescription.message: Please choose Wiktionary. The language used for display differs depending on the site. The quality and scale of information also differs. When you change this, "Language filter" need additional setting.

htmlLanguageFilterDescription.message: Wiktionary article has description for all words of all languages. Using language filter, it's displayed a description of only the language you want.

htmlLanguageFilterAside.message: For example, "four" means "4 " in English, but in French it means "oven, furnace".　If you select "English" for Language filter, only the English description "4" will be displayed.

htmlLanguageFilterDownloadMessage.message: It's downloading list of language from Wiktionary

htmlApiCutOutDescription.message: From the description, cut out the part of "meaning" and display it.

htmlReleaseNoteDescription1.message: Release note is posted on GitHub.

htmlAboutDataDescription1.message: Setting data is sent by the synchronization service provided by the browser. History data is out of the synchronization service.

htmlAboutDataDescription2.message: When click a link or execute wiktionary linkage, it sends basic internet information (IP address, Cookie, etc) and the text selected. HTTP REFER (Information on which site it came from) is excluded.

htmlAboutDataDescription3.message: As needed download favicon images and save it.

htmlIssueDescription.message: Please use GitHub Issues to report a bug, to request, to contact, etc. Writing is open to the public.

htmlIam.message: Freelance programmer, Ryosuke Ohta (太田亮介)

htmlLicenseDescription.message: This software is released under the MIT License.

htmlCheckByteLengthError.message: Please shorten to $MAX_LENGTH$ byte or less (Currently $LENGTH$ bytes).

htmlCheckFieldLengthError.message: You can add up to $MAX_FIELDS$ items at maximum.

htmlCheckPresetLengthError.message: Up to $MAX_FIELDS$ sites can be added. It is set to $SUM$ pieces. Currently $CHECKED$ items are selected. You can add $REMAINING$ more.

htmlCheckLanguageFilterLengthError.message: The number of "Language filter" can be set up to $MAX$
